for_anyone.name: Drop.ist
for_anyone.description: A file sharing web application. Why is it different than GDrive, OneDrive, etc ..? Because you don't need to have any logins. Try it out on drop.ist

for_anyone.name: CPW Website
for_anyone.description:
A website for the organization of Collaborative Professionals of Washington. The website is built on WordPress.
I implemented a highly modified child theme. I implemented many custom features such as: events, custom layouts, etc.. I also integrated the theme with a third-party membership software (aMember).

for_anyone.name: Tristar Website
for_anyone.description: A website for Tri-Star Dental Clinic. The website is built on Squarespace. I implemented a custom Squarespace template.

for_anyone.name: Homeless Portland
for_anyone.description: A website to raise awareness on Portland's homelessness issue.

for_anyone.name: TRI Web Directory
for_anyone.description: A custom web directory page within a Squarespace website. I implemented it using a custom post type, in order to make it easy for the client to add more people to the directory.

for_anyone.description: A simple timesheet logger. Built with JavaScript
